title: When Is the next Ultimate Skin Coming out???
body:
Well it's been ages since Spirit Guard Udyr Came out, So the real question is When is The NEXT ULTIMATE SKIN COMING OUT?????

Riot Please release it sooner!

replies.body: When Rito get their finger out of their bumhole.
